pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Department of Records and Information Services
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: More than 20,000 tapes of programs representing the full range of programming offered at the station over the years. The most complete holdings are programs dealing with local historical and political events. A finding aid is available in the repository.
pageContext._xxxcollectionNotesxtxt: Materials pertaining to Fiorello LaGuardia are cataloged separately.
